help.name: help
help.command: return information about commands Rikard has

addrole.name: addrole
addrole.command: gives a user a desired role r!addrole @[user] [role name]

addXp.name: addXp
addXp.command: gives XP to a user r!addXp @[user] [XP]

ban.name: ban
ban.command: bans a user from the server r!ban @[user] [reason]

createRole.name: createRole
createRole.command: creates a role by specifying name, colour and perms. r!createRole [name] [hexidecimal number] [permission number]

math.name: math
math.command: solve an equation, or use r!math p [number] [number] for percentage

rank.name: rank
rank.command: shows your level, another users level or level stats. r!rank [@user] or [level].Backup your servers ranks with r!rank b

removerole.name: removerole
removerole.command: removes role from user r!removerole @[user] [role name]

resetRank.name: resetRank
resetRank.command: resets a users XP, level and message count r!resetRank @[user]

restoreRank.name: restoreRank
restoreRank.command: restore a users XP, level and message count r!restore @[user] [file]

setRank.name: setRank
setRank.command: sets rank with 3 numers r!setRank @[user] [XP] [Lvl] [Message Count]

takeXp.name: takeXp
takeXp.command: subtracts XP from a user r!takeXp @[user] [XP]

tempmute.name: tempmute
tempmute.command: temporarily restrict a user from typing r!tempmute @[user] [1s/m/h/d]
